lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Life is a moment in space
When the dream is gone, it's a lonelier place
I kissed the morning goodbye
But down inside you know we never know why
The road is narrow and long
When eyes meet eyes and the feeling is strong
I turn away from the wall
I stumble and fall but I give you it all

[Chorus]
I am a woman In Love and I do anything
(I am a Woman In Love and I do anything)
To get you into my world and hold you within
(To get you into my world and hold you within)
It's a right, I defend
Over and over again
(Over and over again)
What do I do

[Verse 2]
With you eternally mine
In love there is no measure of time
We planned it all at the start
That you and I live in each other's heart
We may be oceans away
You feel my love, I hear what you say
No truth is ever a lie
I stumble and fall but I give you it all

[Chorus]
(I am a woman In Love and I do anything)
(To get you into my world and hold you within)
And hold you within
It's a right, I defend
Over and over again
(Over and over again)
What do I do
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
I am a Woman In Love and I'm talking to you
(I am a Woman In Love and I'm talking to you)
You know I know how you feel, what a woman can do
(You know I know how you feel, what a woman can do)
It's a right, I defend
Over and over again
(Over and over again)
(I am a Woman In Love and I do anything)
And I do anything
To get you into my world and hold you within
(To get you into my world and hold you within)
It's a right, I defend
Over and over again
(Over and over again)
